title: Building Sugarloaf Dam
creator_credit: Melbourne and Metropolitan Board of Works and Filmpartnership
brief_description: The preparation and building of the Sugarloaf Dam, on the middle reaches of the Yarra River, at Christmas Hills, to store water drawn from the Yarra River.
